summary: Comprehensive testing of Template Editor MVP completed successfully. All major features are functional including element creation, canvas interaction, properties editing, data integration, and export functionality.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby attributes for accessibility

passed_tests: Template CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
API data fetching from external endpoints
Image Editor tab active by default
Element creation (Text, Rectangle, Circle, Line, QR Code, Barcode, Rating)
Element selection and properties panel interaction
Properties panel controls (position X/Y, size W/H, rotation, opacity)
Data Integration tab with file upload and API options
Zoom controls (slider, zoom in/out buttons, reset)
